doc.field: American Federation of State, County, and Municipal Employees (AFSCME), District Council 1707 Records
American Federation of State, County, and Municipal Employees (AFSCME), District Council 1707 Records

Agency files document Local 1707/DC 1707's relationships with its members' workplaces. Bargaining material includes contracts, agreements and other signed documents, negotiation material, correspondence and memoranda, and notes relating to the collective bargaining process. Grievance files document individual and group grievances against employers. Personnel files generally contain information about workplace staff, hiring, firing, and positions. General Administrative material includes meeting notices, correspondence, and other administrative items. DC 1707 Staff Representative files contain copies of outgoing staff representative correspondence and memoranda involving administrative issues, including bargaining, grievances, and meetings. Affiliated locals are listed in parenthesis when known.
American Federation of State, County, and Municipal Employees (AFSCME), District Council 1707 Records
